name: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures received as a subrecipient, by state, institutional control, and institution: FY 2022
description: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures received as a subrecipient, by state, institutional control, and institution: FY 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_state_institutional_control_and_institution_b
variableMeasured.description: State, institutional control, and institution hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_total_all_r_d_expenditures_received
variableMeasured.description: Total All R D Expenditures Received

variableMeasured.name: field_total_from_higher_education_pass_through_entities
variableMeasured.description: Total From Higher Education Pass Through Entities

variableMeasured.name: field_total_from_other_pass_through_entities
variableMeasured.description: Total From Other Pass Through Entities

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_all_r_d_expenditures_received
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed All R D Expenditures Received

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_from_higher_education_pass_through_entities
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed From Higher Education Pass Through Entities

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_from_other_pass_through_entities
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed From Other Pass Through Entities

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in 2021. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in 2021 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2022, and that form only requested R&D expenditures received from higher education institutions. For a listing of R&D expenditures received from higher education institutions at institutions completing the shorter version of the survey, see table 85.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2022.
